title: Cost standard LLINS — cost_llin
text: n_llin Number standard LLIN bed nets llin_unit_cost Commodity unit cost per standard LLIN bed net. llin_delivery_cost Cost deliver one standard LLIN bet net.

title: Cost standard LLINS — cost_llin
text: llin_unit_cost Current default average cost pyrethroid-ITN, including,   hooks, strings, bag customisation.
